name: 林志哲
objective: 本課程主要介紹最佳控制之相關原理與應用，內容包括如下：最佳控制簡介，性能指標，動態規劃法，變分法, 變分法在最佳控制之應用，最佳控制之數值解與個案研究等。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2-3: The Performance Measure
Week 4-6: Dynamic Programming
Week 7-9: The Calculus of Variations
Week 10: Midterm Test
Week 11-13: The Variational Approach to Optimal Control Problems
Week 14-17: Numerical Determination of Optimal Trajectories
Week 18 Final oral report
materials: Donald E. Kirk Optimal Control Theory: An Introduction Dover Publications 2004 New York, USA
